name: Childrens Home Society of South Dakota
specialty: Residential Treatment Facility  Emotionally Disturbed Children

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Childrens Home Society of South Dakota is a Residential Treatment Facility  Emotionally Disturbed Children provider based in Sioux Falls, SD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $62.7M in Medicaid payments across 8K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $62.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
